meanings.definition: tokes (verb): to inhale and exhale smoke from a cigarette, pipe, or other smoking device
meanings.sent1: He tokes on his pipe slowly.
meanings.sent2: She always tokes on her cigarette during breaks.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to take a toke from the chimney smoke.
meanings.sent4: The factory chimney tokes out thick smoke all day.
meanings.sent5: The dragon tokes out fire from its nostrils.

meanings.definition: tokes (noun): a puff or drag taken from a cigarette or other smoking device
meanings.sent1: He took a toke from his cigarette.
meanings.sent2: She passed the toke around the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The toke of smoke danced in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The toke of laughter filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The toke of music floated through the air.
